no.hig.hers.ludoclient

Class HostGameLobbyController

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.hig.hers.ludoclient.HostGameLobbyController

  • public class HostGameLobbyController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that is made by the host player when the queue game option is chosen. The other players than the host makes a PlayerGameLobbyController instead. The player of that is host can start the game. The player also joins the game chat.
    Author:
    Petter on 27.11.2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      HostGameLobbyController()

      void cleanRemove(java.lang.String name)
      Checks if the list contains the name and then removes it Also set the startGameButton too closed if less than one player is in the lobby

      Sets all labels to empty "", and checks if the playerJoinList containts the name if so the name is added and the startGameButton is opened

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize label text and sets the button to start game as not disabled.

      • setHostPlayer

        public void setHostPlayer(java.lang.String hostName)
        Sets the host player on playerOne label and join game chat.
        Parameters:
        hostName - the name of the game host

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the empty labels of the players that got invited too the game. And removes the startgame lock when there are two players or more
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player that got invited.

      • cleanUp

        public void cleanUp(java.lang.String name)
        Sets all labels to empty "", and checks if the playerJoinList containts the name if so the name is added and the startGameButton is opened
        Parameters:
        name - of the player who joined the lobby

      • cleanRemove

        public void cleanRemove(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the list contains the name and then removes it Also set the startGameButton too closed if less than one player is in the lobby
        Parameters:
        name - of the player to be removed

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the player from the lobby label
        Parameters:
        name - to be removed from label

      • setLabelText

        public void setLabelText()
        Internationalization of the playerLabel, hostLabel and starGameButton.

      • setConnetion

        public void setConnetion(java.io.BufferedWriter write)
        Sets the correct output so that the host can communicate with the game server.
        Parameters:
        write - the bufferedWriter of the gameserver. Connection to the server.

      • sendText

        public static void sendText(java.lang.String textToSend)
        Method used to send a message to the server. Handled in a separate method to ensure that all messages are ended with a newline character and are flushed (ensure they are sent.)
        Parameters:
        textToSend - the message to send to the server
